verses.verse: You,<WH1121> son of man,<WH120> take<WH3947> a sharp<WH2299> sword;<WH2719> You shall take<WH3947> it as a barber<WH1532>'s razor<WH8593> to you,<WH5674> and shall cause it to pass on your head<WH7218> and on your beard:<WH2206> then take<WH3947> balances<WH3976> to weigh,<WH4948> and divide the hair.<WH2505>

A third part<WH7992> you shall burn<WH1197> in the fire<WH217> in the midst<WH8432> of the city,<WH5892> when the days<WH3117> of the siege<WH4692> are fulfilled;<WH4390> and you shall take<WH3947> a third part,<WH7992> and strike<WH5221> with the sword<WH2719> around<WH5439> it;<WH7992> and a third part you shall scatter<WH2219> to the wind,<WH7307> and I will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after them.<WH310>
You shall take<WH3947> of it a few<WH4592> in number,<WH4557> and bind<WH6696> them in your skirts.<WH3671>

Of these again<WH3947> you shall take,<WH7993> and cast them into the midst<WH8432> of the fire,<WH784> and burn<WH8313> them in the fire;<WH784> from it shall a fire<WH784> come forth<WH3318> into all the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> This is Jerusalem;<WH3389> I have set<WH7760> her in the midst<WH8432> of the nations,<WH1471> and countries<WH776> are around her.<WH5439>

She has rebelled<WH4784> against my ordinances<WH4941> in doing wickedness<WH7564> more than the nations,<WH1471> and against my statutes<WH2708> more than the countries<WH776> that are around<WH5439> her;<WH3988> for they have rejected my ordinances,<WH4941> and as for my statutes,<WH2708> they have not walked in them.<WH1980>

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> Because you are turbulent<WH1995> more than the nations<WH1471> that are around<WH5439> you,<WH1980> and have not walked in my statutes,<WH2708> neither have kept<WH6213> my ordinances,<WH4941> neither have done<WH6213> after the ordinances<WH4941> of the nations<WH1471> that are around you;<WH5439>

therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH136> Behold,<WH6213> I, even I, am against you; and I will execute judgments<WH4941> in the midst<WH8432> of you in the sight<WH5869> of the nations.<WH1471>
I will do<WH6213> in you that which I have not done,<WH6213> and whereunto I will not do<WH6213> any more the like,<WH3282> because of all your abominations.<WH8441>

Therefore the fathers<WH1> shall eat<WH398> the sons<WH1121> in the midst<WH8432> of you,<WH1121> and the sons shall eat<WH398> their fathers;<WH1> and I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on you;<WH7611> and the whole remnant of you will I scatter<WH2219> to all the winds.<WH7307>

Therefore,<WH2416> as I live, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH136> surely,<WH2930> because you have defiled my sanctuary<WH4720> with all your detestable things,<WH8251> and with all your abominations,<WH8441> therefore will I also diminish<WH1639> you;<WH5869> neither shall my eye spare,<WH2347> and I also will have no pity.<WH2550>

A third part<WH7992> of you shall die<WH4191> with the pestilence,<WH1698> and with famine<WH7458> shall they be consumed<WH3615> in the midst<WH8432> of you;<WH7992> and a third part shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719> around<WH5439> you;<WH7992> and a third part I will scatter<WH2219> to all the winds,<WH7307> and will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after them.<WH310>

Thus shall my anger<WH639> be accomplished,<WH3615> and I will cause my wrath<WH2534> toward them to rest,<WH5117> and I shall be comforted;<WH5162> and they shall know<WH3045> that I,<WH3068> Yahweh, have spoken<WH1696> in my zeal,<WH7068> when I have accomplished<WH3615> my wrath on them.<WH2534>
Moreover I will make<WH5414> you a desolation<WH2723> and a reproach<WH2781> among the nations<WH1471> that are around<WH5439> you,<WH5869> in the sight of all that pass by.<WH5674>

So it shall be a reproach<WH2781> and a taunt,<WH1422> an instruction<WH4148> and an astonishment,<WH4923> to the nations<WH1471> that are around<WH5439> you,<WH6213> when I shall execute judgments<WH8201> on you in anger<WH639> and in wrath,<WH2534> and in wrathful<WH2534> rebukes;<WH8433> (I,<WH3068> Yahweh, have spoken it;<WH1696>)

when I shall send<WH7971> on them the evil<WH7451> arrows<WH2671> of famine,<WH7458> that are for destruction,<WH4889> which I will send<WH7971> to destroy<WH7843> you:<WH3254> and I will increase the famine<WH7458> on you,<WH7665> and will break your staff<WH4294> of bread;<WH3899>

and I will send<WH7971> on you famine<WH7458> and evil<WH7451> animals,<WH2416> and they shall bereave<WH7921> you;<WH1698> and pestilence and blood<WH1818> shall pass through<WH5674> you;<WH935> and I will bring the sword<WH2719> on you:<WH3068> I, Yahweh, have spoken it.<WH1696>
